resources:
Bumpy
Welcome to Bumpy App! Bumpy is used to collect data about cycling conditions and report road issues in a fun and easy way. Powered by the Croatian Cyclist Union NEXT
Past Trips Map Achievements Settings
These permissions are mandatory to get your location. You need to allow them.
Start Trip End Trip SUBMIT Grant location permission to start trip Current Location
Trip in Progress You need to install Google Play Services to use the App properly km/h % Speed Vibration Distance (km) Duration
